settings.name: WorkOrderList
settings.select: A.[DispatchID], A.[BillState], dbo.f_Getcodename('维修工单状态',A.[BillState]) BillStateName, A.[SignCode], A.[DispatchCode], U.[UserName], A.[InputName], A.[InputTime], A.[AuditName], A.[AuditTime], A.[MeetAutoTime], A.[EstimateTime], A.MeetAutoCode, A.[RunDistance], A.[RepairDescribe], A.[VIN], A.[CustomerID], A.[Demo], A.[RepairName], A.[RepairTel], A.[ManHourFee], A.[SparepartFee], A.[AddonsFee], A.[Amount], A.IsBalance, A.[Remark], A.NextMaintainDistance, A.NextMaintainDate, B.CustomerName, B.MobileTel, D.BrandName, F.SeriesName, E.ModelName, A.IsPay, case when A.IsPay=0 then '未付' else '已付' end IsPayName
settings.from: S_Dispatch AS A LEFT JOIN B_Customer AS B ON A.CustomerID = B.CustomerID LEFT JOIN B_AutoArchives AS C ON A.VIN = C.VIN LEFT JOIN B_AutoBrand AS D ON C.BrandID = D.BrandID LEFT JOIN B_AutoSeries AS F ON C.SeriesID = F.SeriesID LEFT JOIN B_AutoModel AS E ON C.ModelID = E.ModelID LEFT JOIN sys_user AS U ON U.UserCode = A.EmpName

settings.from: S_Balance AS A LEFT JOIN B_Customer AS B ON A.CustomerID=B.CustomerID LEFT JOIN B_AutoArchives AS C ON A.VIN=C.VIN LEFT JOIN sys_user U ON A.EmpName= U.UserCode
